FuncDef: This command specifies the transport option for an X3 interface, along with the ULIC Header version to be used. The same transport option is supported to all the Delivery Function (DF) peers in a service provider network. Changing the option requires a GW shutdown/no shutdown.
CLIs: x3-transport { tcp | udp } ulic-header { v0 | v1 }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use TCP as the transport option for an X3 interface. ParamDefault: Default- Only ULIC Header V1 is supported with this option.
Specifies to use UDP as the transport option for an X3 interface. ParamDefault: Default- Only ULIC Header V0 is supported with this option.
